article:
I am from Indonesia. I was very happy when my sister Vera 41 _  helped me apply to a school in Provo, USA. Meanwhile, I felt 42 _ , because it was my first time to go to another country which used a different language. However, I knew it was a good 43 _ to study in the U.S.
I left my hometown for Singapore on April 23, 2000 at 6:00 pm. It took me 20 minutes by taxi to Changi Airport. The taxi driver44 _ me about the cost. I was supposed to pay him $12, but he charged me $22. I had already45 _ that at that time, but I didn't want to make any   _  because I was alone in another country. 
Unfortunately, the Northwest Airlines counter  was 47 _ . A security guard told me the counter would open at 4 o'clock in the morning, but my48 _ time would be 6:00 am and what made me49 _ was that I didn't have a ticket in my hands. 50 _ , my sister had already booked an online ticket, but I needed to get the51 _ at the airline counter. 52 _ , I could do nothing about that until the next day. Waiting at the airport was so 53 _ . So I went into a cafeteria. I stayed up the whole night54 for fear that  the aircraft would be gone when I55 _ . 
While waiting, I decided to take some pictures for56 _ . I met a new friend named AL Corpus there. He told me about his experience when he arrived in the U.S. for the first time. He   _  me what I would need to do to enter the United States. He was very58 _  and friendly. 
Finally, I arrived in Provo59 _ . Now whenever I think of the trip, I feel happy because I had many unforgettable60 _  on my trip to Provo.
